document_data.name: Manythorns
document_data.mainbody: '''''Manythorns''''' was a [[divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that covered the caster's body with thousands of small, spectral thorns.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell conjured a great many thorns that emerged from the caster's skin. These thorns were weightless and not made up of actual plant material. Additionally they were non-harmful to the caster, offered significant protection from physical attacks and damaged any unarmored individual with whom they came into close contact.
document_data.History: The specifications of this spell were inscribed within the [[relic]] known as the ''[[Leaves of Green]]''.
document_data.Components: In order to be cast, this spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s along with at least six thorns taken from any species of plant.
